***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****

**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [t͡ɕʰẽɡuː]
**** Noun[edit] ****
छेंगू • (cheṃgū) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐕𑐾𑑄𑐐𑐹)
   1. skin
          o The Bible Psalms.102.5:
                  जि तस्‍सलं पिच्‍यानाः
                  हालाच्‍वना।
                  जि छेंगू व क्‍वँय्‌ जक जुइधुन।
                  जक जुइधुन।
                        ji tassalaṃ picyānā:
                        hālācwanā.
                        ji cheṃgū wa kwãê jaka juidhuna.
                        jaka juidhuna.
                        By reason of the voice of my groaning my bones cleave
                        to my skin.
*** Alternative forms[edit] ***
    * छ्येंगु (chyeṃgu)
